description: Sunny 1BR apartment in brownstone on the border of Clinton Hill, Crown Heights and Bedford-Stuyvesant. Parquet floors, private bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom.  Walk to nearby coffee shops and restaurants, Prospect Park farmers market, Brooklyn Museum, Ft. Green Park, Pratt Institute, and downtown Brooklyn. Easy access to A/C Nostrand Express stop to Manhattan (15-20 min); Bedford-Nostrand G stop to Williamsburg/Greenpoint/Queens (15 min). Perfect for a couple, or 1-2 friends visiting NYC!
name: Sunny 1 Bedroom Apt. in Brooklyn
